channel.title: Pages on Manuel Rguez-Sánchez
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Manuel Rguez-Sánchez

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Manuel, student at Kingston University. CV Work Currently I’m finishing my degree in Computer Science at Kinston University. Focusing on Software Engineering and Web Development. Past Work I worked as an intern on a software project at University of Cádiz. That project is called “GuessIt!” and is an application for mobile platforms, mainly Android. The aim of the project is achieve an app which an student would use to learn languages like English or German.

item.title: Personal Projects
item.description: Hero Demo Developed using C++ with OpenGL and GLSL Shaders. Night scene developed with GLSL Shaders, it includes effects like per-fragment point lightning, directional and ambient lightning, particle effects, water rendering, vertex shader water animation, skyboxing, texturing… GitHub Repository. NetflaxCalendar Developed using Python with Dropbox, Twitter and GoogleCalendar API’s and Celery. If you have ever missed the publication of your favorite series on Netflix, the aim of the app is to add an event to a Calendar in GoogleCalendar with the publication date of the series on Netflix.
